title: Sociology of Education - School Closures and the Gentrification of the Black Metropolis
itunes:title: Sociology of Education - School Closures and the Gentrification of the Black Metropolis
description: Author Francis A. Pearman, II discusses his article, "School Closures and the Gentrification of the Black Metropolis," published in the July 2022 issue of Sociology of Education.
